caption: This instrumental song features a run played on a piano followed by an ascending progression on the French horn. The horn plays descending notes and the piano repeats the same melody using arpeggiated chords. This is followed by two ascending notes on the horn. There are no other instruments in this song. This song has a relaxing feel. This song can be played in a bar.
